metadata.name: Potential Arbitrary File Download Via Cmdl32.EXE
metadata.comment: Detects execution of Cmdl32 with the "/vpn" and "/lan" flags. Attackers can abuse this utility in order to download arbitrary files via a configuration file. Inspect the location and the content of the file passed as an argument in order to determine if it is suspicious.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\cmdl32.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('cmdl32.exe') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/vpn')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/lan')))

output.summary: Detects execution of Cmdl32 with the "/vpn" and "/lan" flags. Attackers can abuse this utility in order to download arbitrary files via a configuration file. Inspect the location and the content of the file passed as an argument in order to determine if it is suspicious.
